entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HttpClinet timeout during trimming tests #110707
  • Missed strength reduction #110706
  • System.Globalization.RegionInfo.CurrentRegion returns blank values on Maui #110704
  • OverflowException in LoggerMessageGenerator #110698
    10.0.0
  • Interop Type Mapping #110691
    10.0.0
  • PersistedAssemblyBuilder: unable to retrieve resources added with AddManifestResource #110686
  • Test hole for TrackerObjectManager #110684
  • ASSERT(ThreadStore::IsTrapThreadsRequested()) in Thread::InlineTryFastReversePInvoke #110683
  • Wrong result from CultureInfo.CurrentCulture.Name in iOS #110680
    10.0.0

Closed

  • Suggested enhancements to CheckProjects #10783
    Future
  • [Perf][Windows_NT][x64 & x64] Investigate ByteMark/BenchEmFloatClass improvement #9832
    Future
  • [Perf][Windows_NT][x64 & x64] Investigate ByteMark/BenchEmFloat improvement #9831
    Future
  • Property getter not getting inlined #9632
    Future
  • Prepare the JIT for a standalone build #5510
    Future
  • Arm64 altjit simd issues #9988
    Future
  • [Perf] Investigate Serialization/JsonBenchmarks/SerializeJsonNet Improvement between release/2.0.0 and release/2.1 #9845
    Future
  • [Perf] Investigate Serialization/JsonBenchmarks/SerializeDataContractJson Improvement between release/2.0.0 and release/2.1 #9844
    Future
  • [Perf] Investigate Serialization/JsonBenchmarks/SerializeDataContract Improvement between release/2.0.0 and release/2.1 #9843
    Future
  • [Perf][Windows_NT][x86 & x64] Investigate V8/Richards/Support/Bench improvement #9835
    Future
  • [Perf][Windows_NT][x86] Investigate V8/Crypto/Support/Bench improvement #9834
    Future
  • [Perf][Windows_NT] Investigate ByteMark/BenchAssignRectangular improvement. #9827
    Future
  • [Perf][Windows_NT][x64] Investigate ByteMark/BenchAssignJagged improvement. #9824
    Future
  • Community notifications #109961
  • [Wasm][Profiled AOT] Error: TaskT_TransitionToFinal_AlreadyCompleted #77122
    10.0.0
  • JIT: `fgRemoveBlock` does not maintain edge weights #96614
    Future
  • Error CS0009: Metadata file '/__w/1/s/artifacts/tests/coreclr/AnyOS.x64.Checked/readytorun/determinism/crossgen2determinism/crossgen2smoke/helperildll.dll' could not be opened #110559
  • Windows Defender incorrectly detects malware in ZIP files containing .NET 9 AOT binaries #110541
  • ILCompiler package used in runtime without ensuring matching framework #106740
    10.0.0
  • Cannot build Native AOT for win32 on linux #108587
    Future
  • NativeAOT library folder structure hygiene #108649
    10.0.0
  • IDE Warnings not reported with 9.0.101 #110673
  • GetType() in base class constructor returns differently as in a plugin assembly, with its host program either normally compiled or published as single package. #110679
  • Work to complete the ReJIT on attach feature #12058
  • [Uri] Add methods for urlpath/virtualpath manipulation #29736
  • Bi-modal execution time of System.Net.Http outerloop tests #30257
  • Diagnostics eventcommand argument error when run generic host on netframework #109712
    10.0.0
  • After upgrade to 8.0.0, setting AOT compilation to true breaks published Blazor app. #95322
    8.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • [Test Only] Port the Idna test fixes to support Unicode 15 #110705
    area-System.Globalization
  • [cdac] Remove GetMethodDescData fallback to legacy DAC #110702
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Vectorize System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary #110701
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Collections
  • [cdac] Clear cached data as part of IXCLRDataProcess::Flush #110700
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Remove thread pointer field from AwareLock #110699
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Bugfix InvalidOperationException/IndexOutOfRangeException in HttpListener.EndGetContext #110695
    area-System.Net
  • JIT: Compute `fgCalledCount` earlier #110693
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • vxsort: Add Arm64 Neon implementation and tests #110692
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add linux-riscv64 nativeaot runtime build #110688
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] Fix HostActivation.Tests unknown-rid #110687
    community-contribution, arch-riscv, needs-area-label
  • Fix calling convention mismatch in GC callouts #110685
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [tests] Fix recently added mono test #110682
    needs-area-label
  • Clarify native AOT build instructions #110681
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update Stepping through GenericPInvokeCalli Stub under the Debugger #110677
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Build the "in build" crossgen2 into a pack that we can use within the VMR #110676
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: capture class types when spilling a GDV arg #110675
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Remove unused `Precode::IsCorrectMethodDesc` #110703
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [browser] NativeAOT-LLVM support in browser-bench #110611
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [cDAC] Implement GCCover portion of SOSDacImpl::GetMethodDescData #110322
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [cdac] Fix `ISOSDacInterface13.TraverseLoaderHeap` parameter type #110678
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [cdac] Handle non-IL method descs in `RuntimeTypeSystem_1.GetMethodClassificationDataType` #110602
    enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix crash when pTargetMD is null #110652
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.2
  • JIT: Spill newarr into temp #110518
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove FabricBot from area-owners.md #110525
    area-Meta
  • [release/9.0-staging] JIT: Read back all replacements before statements with implicit EH control flow #109143
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.2
  • JIT: Add an "init BB" invariant #110404
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add bench output log, to the file and to the console #110669
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Remove always-true `fgCanRelocateEHRegions` #110612
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete .GuardCF library build #110671
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • [JIT] Add legacy extended EVEX encoding and EVEX.ND/NF feature to x64 emitter backend #108796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Support disabling event tracing #110622
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • [no-merge][testing] Try Apple mobile platforms on iOS 18 and XCode 16.1 #110566
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 10.0.0
  • Improve codegen for ExtractMostSignificatBits #110662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce memory usage when updating ZipArchives #102704
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Expose StressLog via CDAC and port StressLogAnalyzer to managed code #104999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Avoid remorphing general `gtFoldExpr` return #110658
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable Arm64 RDM on Windows #109493
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Refine assert for RMW check in crc32 codegen #108750
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Don't wait for finalizers in 'IReferenceTrackerHost::ReleaseDisconnectedReferenceSources' #110558
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix crash when pTargetMD is null #110651
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.13
  • [WASI] bump WASI SDK to v25.0 #110654
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Use managed signer for bundles #110417
    area-HostModel
  • [RISC-V] JIT: Fix emitInsMayWriteToGCReg #110390
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Change assembler to clang in android MonoAOT #110393
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add MemoryExtensions overloads with comparer #110197
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use live apphost when publishing ilc as singlefile #105004
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Repair profile after tail-merging #110656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use IRootFunctions in Tensor.StdDev #110641
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix base type marking for DAM annotated classes #110655
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Beginnings of native Android build #110471
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [SwiftBindings] ValueWitnessTable needs some changes #2881

PullRequests

    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 'dotnet nuget why' option to show unique parent packages: --depth 1 #45464
  • [NET9] dotnet test hangs during build #45461
  • Inevitable breaking changes because of code analysis and TreatWarningsAsErrors=true #45453
  • catch-22 regarding running `dotnet restore` vs. `dotnet workload restore` first #45447

Closed

  • Unable to install .NET 8 SDK on Alpine following official instructions #37790
  • Test ChangeFileInFSharpProject is failing on Linux in 9.0.1xx #45457
  • ProcessFrameworkReferences generates an incorrect RuntimeIdentifier when using OutputPath and AppendTargetFrameworkToOutputPath #45446
  • Visual Studio for mac Microsoft.AspNetCore.App downgrade Error #2586
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Use a crossgen2 that runs on the host for R2Ring in a VMR build #45463
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Setup binskim globbing to artifacts/bin w/ workaround #45462
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable dotnet/sdk debs and rpms in the VMR #45460
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • [release/9.0.2xx] Expand MSBuildSdkResolver #45459
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Create document on safely executing repros Fixes #45341 #45456
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Restore detailed test logging to console output #45454
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Detects pre-compressed assets (#44976) #45448
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #45392
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix `Change failed to apply (error code: ...)` intermittent failures #45097
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Watch, 9.0.2
  • Fix a set of test issues caused by an old blob feed and try to fix up the nullable change we rushed in #45420
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2591265 #44765
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Expand MSBuildSdkResolver #45364
    untriaged, Area-SdkResolvers
  • [release/9.0.2xx] Copy dump file to the Helix upload location #45385
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Upgrade latest Alpine to 3.21 for VMR builds #45415
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Fix incorrect apphost being used when publishing for self-contained single-file with `NoBuild=true` #45400
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Don't download Windows SDK ref pack for C++ projects #44956
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Enable ASP.NET Core installers on Linux in the VMR #45437
    untriaged, Area-VMR

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2601367 #45465
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable Nullable Reference Types in Test Projects #44862
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Installer/finalizer in c# #44611
    Area-Infrastructure, 10.0.1xx
  • File watcher improvements #45131
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #45427
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #45365
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Add support for .NET 9.0 web project templates #45423
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new
  • Support package@version syntax for dotnet workload search/update/install version Fixes #42367 #45156
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • sln-remove: Support for slnx #45160
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not automatically add nuget.org as a package source when it is absent from nuget.config Fixes #44312 #45410
    untriaged, Area-Templates
  • Use managed Mach-O signer on non-Mac hosts #45019
    area-Host, untriaged
  • [DO NOT MERGE} Skip a few tests on osx #45419
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 10.0.100-alpha.1.24612.1 #45435
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Copy dump file to the Helix upload location #45345
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • [dotnet-watch] Improve failure reporting in tests #44879
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add hook for importing .props file after .NET SDK props #45151
    untriaged, Area-ILLink, consider-for-documentation

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Delegate invocation can be simplified" crashes on top-level statements #76423
  • "Delegate invocation can be simplified" is shown on non-delegates #76422

Closed

  • IDE0260 code fixer produces invalid code (CS0165) #76372
    Backlog
  • [Analyzer Proposal]: Replace `.Where(x => x is T)` for `.OfType<T>()` #74968
  • Extract Method in file with top-level statements results in compile error #65465
    Backlog
  • "Extract Method" introduces an invalid nullability annotation that results in a nullability issue in the extracted code #61555
    Backlog
  • Load roslyn version of the codestyle analyzers to fix torn load state (causes ReflectionTypeLoadException) #72811
    17.12
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35612.190 #76416
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35612.71 #76410

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid focus changes during argument provider tests #76424
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Move code in extract method to shared location #76421
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Inline hints - fixes bug where hints repeat #76420
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge VB "Overload Resolution Priority" feature to main #76419
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority
  • Reduce allocations again in ComputeReverseReferencesMap #76417
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Call Enter/LeaveRegion APIs for binary expressions #76412
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Simplify parsing #76411
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Slightly reduce allocations in SymbolCompletionItem.AddSymbolInfo #76418
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Change PR Val builds to be unsigned #76358
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Add two more cases for 'simplify linq expression'. #76413
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Small reduction in allocations in DateAndTimeLanguageDetector #76393
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Mark interceptors feature as stable and deprecate file path based attributes #76312
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature - Interceptors, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2600919 #76415
    auto-merge
  • Fix issue with 'use pattern matching' where it would cause a variable to not be considered assigned #76407
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Rename 'scopeOfTheContainingExpression' to 'localScopeDepth' #76400
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Make extracted parameters non-nullable when possible. #76386
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Report inappropriate OverloadResolutionPriority attribute applications #76385
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority
  • Optimize ProjectDependencyGraph.DoesProjectTransitivelyDependOnProject #76399
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix TFM inconsistency in BuildHost #76354
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Cache the compilation states in compilation order to avoid recalculation #76380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to release/dev17.13 #76414
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update LOC branch to 17.13 #76408
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Dictionary expressions: initial binding and lowering support #76257
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Do honor abstract required during state initialization in nullable #76363
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • feat(lsp): add --pipe parameter #76351
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Warn for redundant pattern in `not ... or <redundant>` pattern #75581
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Handle deconstruct pattern in ref safety analysis #75511
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.13 to main #76387
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add spec for the data section string literals feature flag #76139
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Feature - String Literals in Data Section as UTF8
  • Remove scope variance exceptions #76296
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] `InputBase` - allow correct async handling of `ValueChanged` callbacks with `SetCurrentValueAsStringAsync()` #59477
  • I upgraded to 17.12.3 and got a weird error about “DiscoverPrecompressedAssets” task failed unexpectedly. Did not have this issue before upgrading. #59476
  • Rebuild Fails in ASP.NET Project Using .NET Core 6.0 When Using bundleconfig.json, but Clean and Build Succeed #59475
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #59474
  • [Blazor] Get rid of special webassembly behavior in the static web assets SDK #59468
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Issue with StaticWebAssets in Blazor WebAssembly Hosted on .NET 9.0 #59466
    9.0.x
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, json #59465

Closed

  • UserManager.CreateAsync(IdentityUser, Password) PasswordHash property not getting populated correctly #59471
  • .NET 9: `dotnet user-jwts` not working #58996
    9.0.x
  • Blazor WebApp Wasm Hot Reload does not work with UseRouting #52339
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Debugging & Hot Reload is Broken When App's Base Path is Changed #46809
    .NET 10 Planning
  • We are having trouble with both `0.0.0.0` and `0.0.0.1` with [Stripe Elements UI](https://docs.stripe.com/payments/payment-element) for collecting payment card details. #58415
    .NET 10 Planning
  • [OpenAPI] Not adding securitySchemas from document transformers #59454
  • OpenApi generation creates NullableOf version of structs when null is allowed? #59056
  • [Blazor] - Issue calling `submitRequest` on data-enhanced form #58244
    Backlog
  • Correlation failure #58780
  • AssemblyLoadContext cannot be released #59305
  • <input type="radio"> not binding with @bind in Blazor WASM in .NET9 #59235

PullRequests

Created

  • Do a few tricks to shorten the intermediate output paths for the runtime packs #59479
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/9.0] Fix loading dotnet user-jwts config #59473
    area-commandlinetools, 9.0.x

Merged

  • Fix loading dotnet user-jwts config #59425
    area-commandlinetools, 10.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `35d0c36` to `79219e2` #59470
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Fix: Handle null event.submitter in enhanced form submission #59207
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview1
  • Fix up publishing of installers built with shared tooling #59463
    area-infrastructure, feature-installers, 10.0-preview1
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-alpha.1.24609.2 #59389
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • update project templates use primary constructors #55006
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-ui-rendering
  • Fix script tag insertion in DomMerging #51184
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Better implementation of EventCallback.Equals #53395
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • QuickGrid: Add EventCallback<TGridItem> for clicking on a row. #55851
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Change OpenAPI document name resolution to be case-insensitive #59199
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal
  • Upgrade Facebook Graph API version to v21.0 #59387
    area-auth, community-contribution
  • Added simplified null checking. #59331
    community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Include signing key for ValidIssuer when loading JwtBearerOptions from config #59460
    community-contribution, area-security
  • perf: get rid of MemoryStream in `KeyRingBasedDataProtector` #59322
    area-dataprotection, Perf
  • [DRAFT] perf: improve ManagedAuthenticatedEncryptor.Decrypt flow #59424
    area-dataprotection

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • iOS map control intermittent crash #26624
  • Cannot apply app theme bindings for VisualStateGroup Setters in code #26620
  • Border label text cut off #26619
  • Double click back button #26617
  • Compiled code binding isn't intercepted #26616
  • Globe image appearing when selecting an anchor tag in MAUI blazor & crash in VS2022 #26615
  • ScrollView Does Not Work When Touching a Custom Grid with PanGestureRecognizer in .NET MAUI (iOS) #26612
  • Shell TabBar always hide under navigation bar on Android 35 #26611
  • Feature Request: SelectedItemBackgroundColor Property for MAUI ListView Control #26604
  • .Net Maui Crash OnResume #26601
  • Button always overlaps (infront) of other views #26600
  • MA003 false positive with 9.0.21 #26599
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Tabbar disappears when navigating back from page with hidden TabBar in iOS 18 #26598
    .NET 9 Servicing

Closed

  • Intellisense unable to track the Images folder structure in the default Resources folder #26622
  • Bugs in Absolute Layout with .NET 9 #26317
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Picker ItemsSource changed case exception: Value does not fall within the expected range #25792
    .NET 9 SR3
  • Shadow property in BoxView in .NET MAUI #26610
  • ILLINK and Release Versions specify different Xcode versions #26605
  • ObservableCollection changing after page with ListView it was bound to closed with PopModalAsync #26577
  • Add true SVG support #26597
  • The keyboard is not opening in the Android 15 simulator #26587
  • Setting Source on a binding when x:DataType is set is not allowed #26580
  • iPad - ActionSheet does not stay in the centre of the screen on orientation change #26560
    .NET 9 SR3
  • After updating to v9.0.21, the Preferences storage has been relocated from the LocalAppData folder to the AppData folder on the Windows platform. #26602
  • MacCatalyst currently doesn't surface unhandled exceptions in user code so we should help MAUI users out #7176
    Backlog
  • Why ColortoInverseColorConverter requires [RequireService] ? #26589
  • workload error #26596
  • maui accessibility FlyOutItem not speaking by screenreader #20319

PullRequests

Created

  • [ci] Add unit test jobs to dnceng builds #26623
  • [testing] Try make tests more stable #26621
    area-testing, testing-flakiness, testing-green-ci
  • [Windows] Fix for Exception occurring when using the GroupShortNameBinding in a Grouped ListView #26613
    community ✨, area-controls-listview, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 49 #26609
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for CarouselView reverts to displaying 1st item in collection when collection modified #26608
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 48 #26607
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 47 #26606
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 13330: Build ID 10696069 #26556
    area-templates
  • Fix for Picker ItemsSource changed case exception: Value does not fall within the expected range #26325
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-picker, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 44 #26563
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Invert SourceRect width/height on orientation change for ActionSheet #26561
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-dialogalert, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 45 #26564
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Revert "[iOS] Fixed HeaderFooterGrid to pass on CV1 and CV2 " #26595

Updated

  • Don’t call NSAttributedString with HTML from a background thread #26153
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, area-controls-label, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Android]: Preserve the ActivityResultRegistry During MauiAppCompatActivity Creation #25404
    platform/android 🤖, area-core-lifecycle, community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] Use a GeneralWrapperView for a Flyout View #26461
    community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • [iOS] Inherit UIContainerView from MauiView #26576
    area-architecture, community ✨
  • Fixed Net 8: Page and control Unloaded events firing on iOS when navigating to another page #25852
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Windows] Fix Shell animation and button visual states on Shell nav #26521
    area-navigation
  • Fixed Extra Padding on iOS buttons required when image on top or bottom #26018
    community ✨, area-controls-button, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • Add the scenario tests for the skiasharp backend #26591
    area-testing
  • [iOS] CollectionView item sizing wrong after refresh #21736
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR3
  • [ci] Enable source index #26557
    area-infrastructure, t/docs 📝, .NET 9 SR3
  • Fixed Shell Navigating event issue when switching tabs #25749
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Disable `MeasureInvalidated` propagation by default / clean-up legacy layouts / fix iOS CV items resize #25664
    area-layout, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fix android image loading race condition and improve logging #25870
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨
  • [Android] Fixed CollectionView reordering last item #17825
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, stale
  • Fix up relevant CA1416 warnings #26593
    area-infrastructure
  • [XC] fix excessive boxing #26465
    area-xaml, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Android] Fix ImageButton Padding the third #25223
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • Fix for CollectionView with RefreshView when ObservableCollection<T>.Clear() throws System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException #26573
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 46 #26570
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for Setting Window.TitleBar to null does not remove the customization  #26568
    community ✨, area-controls-titlebar, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fix for Flyout closing when updating the FlyoutPage.Detail #26425
    do-not-merge, area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix more things with fonts (embedded) and unpackaged apps #26515
    area-fonts
  • Fixed iOS button flickering animation when layout updates #25662
    area-layout, area-controls-button, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed [Android] Label's HorizontalTextAlignment property is not updated properly at runtime #25176
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] Ensure all controls in Layout with Search Bar are visible in Landscape Mode #24198
    community ✨, area-controls-entry, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing

  • Fixed CheckBox enabled color is not updated properly #26399

  • Fix for unable to select a tab after backing out of a page and returning. #25011
    platform/windows 🪟, area-navigation, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EFCore 9.0 AccessViolationException #35331
  • Setting entity/property name via IEntityTypeAddedConvention breaks migration #35330
  • Can't ignore an ImmutableArray<> property in entity configuration #35329

Closed

  • Customizing migration detection and generation #34454
  • Have a tests suite (or model) specifically for method/member translations #34872
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Adding Half type support for SqlLite #35328
  • Translate to NULLIF #35327
  • Fix to #35239 - EF9: SaveChanges() is significantly slower in .NET9 vs. .NET8 when using .ToJson() Mapping vs. PostgreSQL Legacy POCO mapping #35326

Merged

  • Refactor method/member translation tests into their own suite #35319

Updated

  • [WIP] Handle first class spans #35279
